name: yuppie
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young person who lives in a city, earns a lot of money, and spends it doing fashionable things and buying expensive possessions: They're just a couple of yuppies with more money than sense.

Add to word list
Add to word list
a young, educated person who lives in a city and is successful in business, and who has a life style that involves spending a lot of money: Once the yuppies started moving in, rents went way up.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a young person who lives in a city, earns a lot of money, and spends it doing fashionable things and buying expensive possessions: a yuppie bar/flat the yuppie consumer/market The term jetset can no longer be confined to yuppies, and international business executives.
